mapper.select: SELECT REST_NUM, REST_NAME,ORIGIN_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT REST_NUM, REST_NAME,ORIGIN_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM RESTAURANT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(REST_NUM=REF_BNO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY REST_NUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
mapper.update: UPDATE RESTAURANT SET REST_CHECK = REST_CHECK + 1 WHERE REST_NUM = #{restNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT REST_NUM, REST_NAME, SUGGESTION, REST_CHECK, ORIGINAL, REST_DELETE, DUCTION, GRADE, MENU, OPENING, ADDRESS, REGION, RESTAURANT.STATUS, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM RESTAURANT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(REST_NUM=REF_BNO) WHERE REST_NUM = #{restNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = 1
SELECT FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = #{restNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT(REST_NUM, REST_NAME, ORIGINAL, DUCTION, MENU, OPENING, ADDRESS, REGION) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{restName}, #{original}, #{duction}, #{menu}, #{opening}, #{address}, #{region})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL, STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_ATTNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel}, 'Y')
